title: Set up the website
body:
Set up the hackfest website for the participants. 
  1. [ ] Clone [`hackfest-site`](https://github.com/AAROC/hackfest-site) to a new repo. 
  1. [ ] Update the event metadata in `_data/hackfest.yml` :
    1. [ ] Where is your fork of the repo ? _e.g._ `repo: Sci-GaIA/addis-hackfest-site`
    1. [ ] Check that the topic on the forum for attendees to introduce themselves  has been created : _e.g._ `discuss_topic: http://discourse.sci-gaia.eu/t/agenda-and-training-infrastructure-of-the-wacren-hackfest-lets-start-the-discussion/2366`
    1. [ ] Check the agenda link _e.g._ `agenda: https://indico.wacren.net/event/43/overview`
    1. [ ] Check the registration link _e.g._ `registration: https://indico.wacren.net/event/43/registration/register#/register`
    1. [ ] Set the start and end times, using [epoch time](http://www.freeformatter.com/epoch-timestamp-to-date-converter.html) : _e.g._ 
      * `start_time`: 1479711600
      * `end_date`: 1480521600
